sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>bone</radical>s <radical>have</radical> a <radical>scooter</radical> that moves through the <kanji>bone marrow</kanji> inside them.
meaningInfo: If you think about it, bone marrow is really just a road for tiny blood scooters.
readingMnemonic: If you put your ear really close to a bone with <kanji>marrow</kanji> still in it, you'll hear the scooters going <reading>zuwee</reading> (<ja>ずい</ja>) as they move the blood around inside there.
readingInfo: That's how doctors can tell if there's something wrong with your bone marrow. If they can't hear the zuuwee of the scooters, you're gonna die soon. I mean, maybe, I'm not a doctor.
